District Attorneys Council Home Page / District Attorneys

 

To view each county's name, district number, and district attorney, place your mouse pointer over each county and hold it still. Momentarily the information will appear next to your cursor. To view more information on a district, click on a county within that region.

District District Attorney Counties Served

2     Angela Marsee     Beckham, Custer, Ellis, Roger Mills, Washita
3     David Thomas     Greer, Harmon, Jackson, Kiowa, Tillman,
